thread.title: This salty reaction GIF is the internet's new favorite meme
thread.title_full: This salty reaction GIF is the internet's new favorite meme

author: Brian Koerber
title: This salty reaction GIF is the internet's new favorite meme
text:
Salty reaction GIFs have a special home on Twitter. Sometimes they just work better than anything you can write in 140 characters.
Though a GIF of Giant Bomb's video producer and podcaster Drew Scanlon has existed in the gaming community for quite some time, it has only received wide-spread internet notoriety in the last few weeks, which is fortunate, because it deserves the internet's admiration.
SEE ALSO: Where the hell did this head-banging purple bird meme even come from
As noted by the internet meme database Know Your Meme , the GIF comes from Giant Bomb's video titled "Unprofessional Fridays." In the clip, Scanlon reacts to Jeff Gershman saying he is ‚ÄúFarming with my hoe.‚Äù
While the reaction is pretty hilarious in its context, it has endless uses. It has recently become more popular after Twitter user eskbli tweeted the GIF on Feb. 5, racking up over 49,000 retweets.
me: ill take a biology class, im smart enough for this just watch me
teacher: cells
me: pic.twitter.com/fHJJsPLioO
‚Äî iniroüêî (@eskbl) February 5, 2017
After another tweet went viral on Feb. 9, the Giant Bomb subreddit took note and questioned when the GIF would officially become a meme.
white people: I'm 38% german, 35% swedish, 25% danish, 2% milk
me: I'm puerto rican not mexican
white people: pic.twitter.com/oTHuD1vtTu
‚Äî Jexi üêæ (@sincerelyjexi) February 9, 2017
"How many more popular Tweets does Drew need to appear on in order to be elevated to meme status?" the post asks.
Well. it's here, folks. The GIF has been elevated to meme status.
me: i want to‚Äì
my bank account: pic.twitter.com/cmTq5mWqt2
‚Äî jaboukie young-white (@jaboukie) February 15, 2017
White People: I can't believe that people keep animals chained up
Me: almost like slavery
White people: slavery? pic.twitter.com/bUY0ONL4Rb
‚Äî Supreme Khairy (@OMG_ItsKhairy) February 15, 2017
Christians: separate the KKK from Christianity!!
Muslims: separate ISIS from Islam.
Christians: pic.twitter.com/j9VYyTlrf9
‚Äî ‚Äî (@MosDebt) February 14, 2017
Me acting surprised on judgment day when I get told I'm going to hell pic.twitter.com/BihKoL7d6q
‚Äî John Wayne (@abedelrey) February 15, 2017
Me: this tests is gonna be so easy, Ima get a 100
